biotools.summary:
Server for performing blind docking calculations. Unique approach where user only inputs ligand and protein, and where the whole protein surface area is processed in order to find potential ligand interaction spots. Main application case can be found at:

https://www.nature.com/articles/s41589-019-0278-6

bioschemas.name: Blind Docking Server
